title: AWS Lambda with Quarkus
summary: This guide provides comprehensive instructions on deploying Quarkus-based AWS Lambda functions, including prerequisites, creating projects with Maven or Gradle, handling Lambda functions, building and deploying to AWS, tunable performance through native compilation, and additional capabilities like X-Ray tracing and HTTPS. It covers both JVM and GraalVM native deployments, emphasizing configuration and operational details essential for successful deployment and optimal performance in AWS Lambda environments.
